creditline: The Ted and Dr. Roberta Mann Foundation Endowment
markings: verso BC, graphtite: L.A. Civic Center, 1980 #12
text: A woman sits on a short wall, at the entrance of a building. She looks longingly to the left, at an otherwise uninhabited daytime scene. At far right there are trees set against a light-colored multi-story building.
title: Downtown Civic Center, Public Use Areas #12
